permissions: Requires authentication. Admins can create action items. Non-admins can create action items only if they are a member of the responsible organization or its broker.
side_effects: Creates an action item record. The server may create an associated tracker asynchronously and touch the linked incident after create.
validation_notes: --title is required. due-on must be ISO 8601 date (YYYY-MM-DD). status and kind must use allowed enum values. requires-xbe-feature must be true/false. responsible-organization must be Type|ID (e.g., Broker|123) and is required by the server; the type must be one of Broker, Customer, Trucker, MaterialSupplier. expected-cost-amount and expected-benefit-amount must be numeric and >= 0; if either is set, currency_code must be present. status=complete requires completed_on to be set, and completed_on cannot be set unless status is complete.

flags.name: --kind
flags.description: Kind: feature, integration, sombrero, bug_fix, change_management, data_seeding, training
flags.validation: Enum values: feature, integration, sombrero, bug_fix, change_management, data_seeding, training.

flags.name: --responsible-organization
flags.description: Responsible organization in Type|ID format (e.g. Broker|123)
flags.validation: Type|ID format, e.g. Broker|123. Type must be Broker, Customer, Trucker, or MaterialSupplier.

flags.name: --status
flags.description: Status: editing, ready_for_work, in_progress, in_verification, complete, on_hold
flags.validation: Enum values: editing, ready_for_work, in_progress, in_verification, complete, on_hold.
